episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00: Man oh man... What is going on today?

You actually bothered coming to a lonely
odd place like this?

If you’re wondering why I’m here, then
it seems we’ve the same question for
each other.

I’m here because I was playing a little
solo game.

I was trying to determine whether the next
person to come by would be an adult.

I was simply curious and wanted to test
my intuition.

However, as I predicted the next visitor
would be indeed...
it appears my instincts failed me.

Heh. You seem curious why I’m so interested
in this place.

But I’m not telling anyone—not even you.
This conversation is over.
(Act sad that he doesn’t trust you.)

Heh. It hurts my heart to see such a look on
your face.

(Ask him why. You thought you were
friends.)

You really are an interesting one. For a
moment there, you almost had me.

But a true competitor never reveals
their hand.

It can give away all sorts of personal
information: hobbies, interests, quirks...
even your upbringing.

In any competition, understanding your
opponent can be an ace up your sleeve!

Knowing how much of yourself to reveal
is a tactic itself!
However...
It appears you’re the type who trusts easily.

On the other hand, that may be one of your
greatest strengths.

Either way, you still seem dissatisfied.
Here, I have an idea.

If you’re so curious about me, why don’t we
spend the day together?

You can figure out with your own eyes what
kind of person I, Grimsley, am.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] studied Grimsley
all day...

but couldn’t figure out anything new
about him.

Why the long face,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
It’s about time I explain myself, isn’t it.

The truth is, where we went today had
nothing to do with me. I chose what I
thought YOU’d find interesting.

Wait! I’m not done. You can complain once
I’ve finished.

The relationships you’ve built with others—
they transcend winning or losing.

Fascinated, I decided to make a game out
of it. I used myself as bait to get a peek at
your “cards.”
However...

I was unable to determine the source of
your strength...

in the same way you were unable to better
understand me.

In other words, there’s no winner or loser.
This game between us is a draw.

Heh. Why the look? Your face says you’re
still dissatisfied.

You’re the type of person who believes
winning isn’t everything. How is this not
the perfect ending?

Still not convinced, huh? I guess you’re also
not a fan of losing.

Fine. Then how about you and I play
another game?

If you can correctly predict how a flipped
coin will land...

I’ll tell you about myself. And this time,
I mean it!

If your skill is true, you’ll learn all about me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
(Pick heads.)

Now that’s what life’s about! You chose
without hesitating.
(Pick tails.)

Nice! Not a bad choice at all. I like your
style, kid.
Now...
Let’s see whom lady luck smiles upon!
